name: Fully Connected Neural Network training and inference over MNIST dataset
description: Trainign and inference with MNIST dataset

trainging_sample_processing_time.regex: Sample processing time during training: [+-]?([0-9]+([.][0-9]*)?|[.][0-9]+) sample/seconds

Inference_in_sample_time.regex: Testing the model in-sample took [+-]?([0-9]+([.][0-9]*)?|[.][0-9]+) seconds

Inference_in_sample_processing_time.regex: Sample processing time during inference in-sample: [+-]?([0-9]+([.][0-9]*)?|[.][0-9]+) sample/seconds

Inference_out_of_sample_time.regex: Testing the model out-of-sample took [+-]?([0-9]+([.][0-9]*)?|[.][0-9]+) seconds

Inference_out_of_sample_processing_time.regex: Sample processing time during inference out-of-sample: [+-]?([0-9]+([.][0-9]*)?|[.][0-9]+) sample/seconds
